item.description:
Here it is!!! Your next opportunity to get RICH has finally come. We will meet at the Brookline Library at 1:30pm on Sunday December 7, 2008 to play CASHFLOW!!

Things to remember:
1. PLEASE BE ON TIME--this game is very involved and there's lots to learn, so let's get started quickly
2. Bring your board(s) if you have them
3. Bring your CALCULATOR

Depending on the number of attendees, we will separate tables based on experience. That way newer players can learn better and at their own speed, and more advanced players can progress faster.

There is a $5 fee per person because the room costs $50 to rent. As in the past, any overage will be kept for future rooms and/or more Cashflow equipment. An account of the monies can be made available at ANY time.

LOOKING FORWARD TO SEEING YOU ALL THERE!!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the Main Conference Room....follow the Money!!!
item.name: UPCOMING CASHFLOW MEETUP!!!
